attributes.action: Increase funding for the NHS Gender Clinic to make it more widely accessible
attributes.additional_details: The NHS gender clinic is currently incredibly underfunded and has waiting lists of years just for an appointment. Non-cisgender people are missing out on treatment and threapy that could be life saving - the suicide rate for transgender people is still incredibly high, largely due to the difficulty of accesing care.
attributes.background: I would like to see an increase in funding for the NHS's gender clinics, and make gender clinics more widely available across the country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321492
